title: If someone is being a real jerk to you...
body:
Just be nice to them. Who knows, maybe they will end up carrying you.

http://i.imgur.com/WCzeqcR.gif"

replies.body: I hope they kiss me on the head too
what if it's the enemy team being a real jerk :(

U penetrate them with pointy objects. 

Spears, swords  and stuff.

i do this sometimes.
Usually i just ignore jerks but when someone is specifically being an ass/troll to me or something i just have fun with it.

One time after a game where someguy was being an asshole to me i was like, you're funny, i wanna be friends with funny people. and then friend requested him a couple times.

It was so funny.
Yeah. Plus, if you're super nice to a troll, it really pisses them off and it's hilarious.
This happened to me today, although our Graves was arguing with Rengo. I was nice to him, and, even though he didn't carry, he stopped raging.
What if... I'm the jerk? EVERYONE BOW DOWN TO ME
That is so cute. :') Thanks for the post.
I think I have a DVD with this episode/whatever you call a Looney Tunes thing on it.
Lol I think this gif fits perfectly
